item.title: Engine and Transmission v35 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 2, 2025

Engine and Transmission v35 ATS

Created and tested by Raiden
This update fixes all variants, making them tidier and cleaner.
Powerful ATS V30 Engine and Gearbox Package
Updated to version 1.55
Engines include different sounds depending on the model.
Detroit
Cummins
Caterpillar
Paccar
Mack
OMC
GMC
Scania

Gearboxes include 6-, 7-, 8-, 12-, 15-, 16-, 18-, 20-, and 21-speed models.
Includes a variety of manual transmissions with and without retarders.

ENGINES:
– 350 HP
– 400 HP
– 435 HP
– 475 HP
– 500 HP
– 550 HP
– 600 HP
– 625 HP
– 735 HP
– 800 HP
– 1000 HP
– 1100 HP
– 10,000 HP

SOUNDS:
– Air brakes
– Engine sounds

TRUCKS:
All base trucks from the game
Also includes a variety of external trucks, among others.

Credits: Thanks to Jc's Jerry the Slave zeemods and other developers

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo Nh12 v1.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 2, 2025

Volvo Nh12 v1.1 ETS2

The Volvo NH12 was a significant heavy-duty truck model produced by Volvo, particularly popular in Brazil and other parts of the world. It was known for its “conventional” or “semi-forward control” cabin design, where the engine is in front of the cab, unlike the more common “cab-over-engine” design prevalent in Europe.

Key Features and History
Production Years: The Volvo NH12 was launched in Brazil in 1999 and continued to be sold until 2006. It replaced the Volvo NL12 EDC, maintaining a traditional semi-forward cabin style that Volvo had used since its arrival in Brazil in the 1980s.
Design and Technology: The NH12 brought significant updates in design, resembling the Volvo VN models from North America. It incorporated new electronic features and advanced technology for its time, including:
Engine: It typically featured a Volvo D12C engine, a 12-liter (12.1 or 12.8-liter depending on the specific version) 6-cylinder diesel engine with electronic fuel injection and individual injector units per cylinder. Power outputs varied, commonly ranging from 380 to 460 horsepower, with some early versions also offering 340 hp. Later models in 2003 also saw the introduction of a more powerful 460 hp version and the first generation of the automated I-Shift transmission.
Transmission: Available with manual transmissions (e.g., 12-speed) or the first generation of the I-Shift automated transmission (VT24 12B) with 12 gears.
Braking System: Equipped with advanced braking systems like ABS and the VEB (Volvo Engine Brake), which was considered one of the most powerful engine brakes of its era.
Cabins: Offered in various cabin configurations, including low-roof extended, low-roof with sleeper, and the larger Globe Trotter with a double sleeper.
Configurations: Available in 4×2, 6×2, and 6×4 axle configurations.
Market Impact: The NH12 was a significant model for Volvo, bridging the gap between the traditional “conventional” trucks and the more modern “cab-over” designs like the FH series. It was considered a sophisticated truck, offering high levels of comfort and technology to the market.

Common Uses
The Volvo NH12, as a heavy-duty prime mover, was primarily used for long-haul transportation and heavy-duty hauling applications. This included:
Tractor Units/Prime Movers: Hauling various types of trailers, such as dry vans, flatbeds, tankers, and refrigerated trailers.
Tipper Trucks: Some configurations were used as tipper trucks for bulk material transport.

Current Status
The Volvo NH12 is no longer in production. Its production officially ended in 2006, at which point Volvo shifted its focus entirely to cab-over-engine designs in many markets, including Brazil. Despite being out of production for many years, the NH12 remains a recognizable and admired truck, particularly in the used truck market in regions where it was popular. Some custom builds even integrate the classic NH12 cab with modern Volvo FH chassis and powertrains to create “retro-modern” trucks.

Credits: RONY

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Volvo FH12 2004 E FH16 2009 By Lo Gamer v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 2, 2025

Volvo FH12 2004 E FH16 2009 By Lo Gamer v1.0 ETS2

It sounds like you’re interested in some classic Volvo trucks, specifically the FH12 from 2004 and the FH16 from 2009, perhaps in the context of truck simulation games like Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), where “Lo Gamer” is a known creator of mods!
Let’s break down these two iconic Volvo models and then touch on their presence in the modding community.

Volvo FH12 2004
The Volvo FH12 was a workhorse in the heavy transport industry, and the 2004 model year would have been part of its second generation (often referred to as FH Version 2 or FH Classic).
Engine: The “12” in FH12 refers to its 12-liter (D12) engine. In 2004, these engines typically offered power outputs ranging from 380 hp to 500 hp, making them highly versatile for various transport tasks. They were known for their robust performance and efficiency.
Technology: By 2004, the FH series already featured advanced electronics, including the VEB (Volvo Engine Brake) for powerful auxiliary braking, and the optional I-Shift automated manual transmission, which was a game-changer for driver comfort and fuel economy.
Design: The cab design was modern for its time, with various options like the Globetrotter and Globetrotter XL for long-haul comfort, offering ample space and amenities for drivers.
Purpose: The FH12 2004 was commonly used for a wide range of applications, including general cargo, refrigerated transport, bulk hauling, and even some specialized heavy-duty tasks.

Volvo FH16 2009
The Volvo FH16 is the most powerful variant of the FH series, designed for the heaviest and most demanding transport operations. The 2009 model would have been part of the same generation as the FH12 2004 but featuring more powerful engines.
Engine: The “16” in FH16 signifies its 16-liter (D16) engine. In 2009, this engine was available with impressive power outputs, including 600 hp, 700 hp, and later even 750 hp. This immense power and torque made it suitable for massive loads.
Purpose: The FH16 is specifically built for heavy-haulage, timber transport, mining, and other applications where extreme pulling power is essential. It’s the king of the road when it comes to tackling the toughest jobs.
Distinguishing Features: While sharing the same cab architecture as the FH12, the FH16 typically has more robust chassis components, higher gross vehicle weight (GVW) and gross combination weight (GCW) ratings, and often more aggressive styling elements to denote its superior power.

“Lo Gamer” and Truck Simulation Mods
“Lo Gamer” is a well-known name in the Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) and American Truck Simulator (ATS) modding communities, particularly here in Brazil. Mod creators like Lo Gamer enhance the game experience by:
Adding new trucks: They create highly detailed models of real-life trucks, like the Volvo FH12 2004 and FH16 2009, that might not be officially in the game or offer more customization options than the default ones.
Customization: Their mods often include a vast array of customization parts, such as unique paint jobs, interior accessories, chassis options, engine tuning, and various lights and details, allowing players to personalize their trucks to an incredible degree.
Realism: Many of Lo Gamer’s mods focus on bringing a more realistic feel to the game, from accurate engine sounds to physics adjustments.
For players who appreciate classic truck models and extensive customization, mods by creators like Lo Gamer are invaluable for keeping their virtual trucking adventures fresh and exciting. You can often find videos on YouTube showcasing their work, detailing the features and options available in their truck mods.
Are you looking to use these models in a game, or are you interested in their real-world specifications?

Credits: LEO GAMER

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

– Update 1.55

– Real hotel & motels names

Works with:
– ATS version 1.55
– DX11 & OpenGL
– All DLC’s fully supported, not all are needed to run the mod.
– Convoy
– Most common used map mods

item.title: Real companies, gas stations & billboards Extended v1.02.03 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 2, 2025

Real companies, gas stations & billboards Extended v1.02.03 ATS

Changelog v1.02.03 (1.55)
Added a new RV-company with 3 depots
Added Mountain Home Airforce Base (requires Idaho DLC)
Bugfixes

Description:
This add-on of our popular real companies, gas stations & billboards mod will go further where the Steam limitations can take us. In the initial release we have decreased the number of Walmart’s by changing them to Target and Swift depots. This means Target and Swift won’t be just in the Texas DLC anymore. It also opens the door to add regional supermarkets in the future.
Also in the initial release is IKEA. We took the ETS2 prefab and placed in ATS. There are about 9 depots, all in the cities we’re they are in real-life. Last, but not least, we opened up some landmarks to deliver to. You can now go to several stadiums, convention centers and maybe even a festivalground..
For this mod, the Texas & Colorado DLC’s are required!

Load order:
Real companies, gas stations and billboards extended
Real companies, gas stations and billboards
All other mods

Compatibility: 1.55

Credits: MLH82

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
